answerText: Christopher Marlowe[10] Sarah Millwood seduces George Barnwell and incites him to rob his employer and murder his uncle in an attempt to swindle in his money in this dramatist's The London Merchant.  His other plays include The Christian Hero and Fatal Curiosity.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | Finals 2 | 12 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: For 10 points each, name these British playwrights: [10] Barabas poisons his daughter Abigail after Abigail joins a nunnery in this author's play The Jew of Malta.  He also wrote Tamburlaine and Doctor Faustus.
